name: the compression of a winged sculpture
description: the compression of a winged sculpture is an interactive digital experience presented in an html+js interface exploring the relationship of resolution and time. The work is not invested in representing the signals attributed to significant monuments and instead is focused on exploring how those signals are compressed and what remains through the consequences of resolution and retrieval. Explore by pointing or touching about the horizontal dimension of the screen. @luisfraguada luis@fraguada.net
